title: Odell injured, Ezekiel Elliott stays in the news (Football 8/23)
description:
Nick Kostos, Will Brinson and Pete Prisco discuss the potential for Odell Beckham to miss Week 1 (2:15), whether the hit on Odell was dirty or illegal (7:30), and if the Giants will pay OBJ (9:31). The guys also examine the always interesting quarterback situation in Cleveland (18:04), and react to Tom Savage being named the starter in Houston. They dive into Le'Veon Bell's scheduled return to the Steelers (36:42), the latest with Ezekiel Elliott (40:12), and Mike Martz's recent comments concerning Rams coach Sean McVay (42:56). Of course Game of Thrones talk is involved (47:30). Then Will and Pete are joined by Jason La Canfora to chat Brock Osweiler (57:44), and Joe Flacco (1:00:44).
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
